features.featureTitle: Save the uploaded houseboat image (Gemini_Generated_Image_ylgl2uylgl2uylgl.png) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-houseboat.png and update the Hero component to use this new image as the full-screen background, replacing the existing hero background image. Maintain the existing dark overlay for readability.

In the Hero component, remove the three summary stat items — '500+ Happy Travellers', '7 Destinations', and '5 Star Review' — along with any surrounding container or divider elements used solely to display those stats. The heading, subheading, and CTA buttons must remain unchanged.
